Reviews.Title: Heavy to hold, good looking, average performance
Reviews.Author: Xiaoyu Zhang
Reviews.Content: The whole device together with the adapter is really heavy to hold, appro 6lbs or more.The keyboard pad is soft and delicate. It feels like a gentle press on buttons will bend the pad inside a little bit.Overall it has a nice looking with silver color. It equipped with Beats Audio, which I could say one of few spotlights I would admire.

Reviews.Title: stylish, excellent for graphical usage,
Reviews.Author: Sherif Abdel Hafeiz Gad
Reviews.Content: 16 GB RAM, NVIDIA graphic card resulted in great movie playing, conversion and rendering1TB HD is amazing to store all what you need at one placeHowever I faced a weird spontaneous change in screen resolution (Icons get bigger and relocated to out of original screen frame so I had to CTRL+ALT+DEL) in order to restart the LT!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows® 8.1 64; 4th Gen Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache)
1TB (1,024GB) Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart Protection; Genuine HP factory installed 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz RAM (2 Dimm)
15.6" Touch Screen LED-backlit display, 1920-by-1080 resolution (10 Point Multi-Gesture)
2GB NVIDIA GeForce 840M Dedicated Graphics, HDMI, 4 USB 3.0 Ports
Backlit Keyboard, Intel Dual Band AC WLAN and Bluetooth® 4.0, Beats Audio
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 15 QE 4th Gen i7-4700MQ, 2GB NVIDIA graphic, FULL HD 1080, Backlit Keyboard, Bluetooth, Touchscreen FULLY LOADED Notebook Laptop PC with valid HP Warranty (8GB DDR3 RAM)
